Attributes.description: Analysis of topics such as jurisdiction, immunity from prosecution, mutual assistance in penal matters, recognition and enforcement of foreign penal laws, and international police cooperation; examination of selected offences such as war crimes, crimes against humanity, genocide, terrorism, illicit drug trafficking, and torture.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Allard, Room: Hall
